pullRequest.title: Populate ClientInfo in Verifier JDBC queries
pullRequest.bodyText:
== RELEASE NOTES ==

Verifier Changes
* Add support to populate client info for the queries issued by Verifier.
* Add configuration property ``test_name``, to be passed in to the client info blob.

nodes.bodyText: Just double check: is this the original query id? :)

nodes.bodyText: A common pattern in Presto code base is to have a private static final OBJECT_MAPPER in this class 😃  . But either way is fine :)
